ygData.subject: Re: Lute of the Gypsy Princess un-nerfed? DOUBLE the effect?!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... At level 38 I could heal 15hp per pulse with a normal lute. I know for certain a level 45 bard cannot heal 22hp per pulse (which is half the stated 45hp
ygData.messageBody:
>Well, a guildmate of mine stated today that he is now able
>to heal 45 points per tick with his Lute of the Gypsy Princess
>found in Mistmoore. He is a lvl 45 bard.

At level 38 I could heal 15hp per pulse with a normal lute.
I know for certain a level 45 bard cannot heal 22hp per pulse
(which is half the stated 45hp with double effect). Can a
level 45ish bard state what healing they can do with a lute
standing up? And could one of our level 50s state what the
max healing per pulse is?

I cannot and will not say anyting about the LotGP until I've
seen it first hand or tried it myself. But +100% to stringed?
That means you can double the dmg chords does for starters.
Nothing in the game thus far is _that_ good, not even that drum
from Nagafen or the flute from Cazic.

Harmonic Distortion, 39th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
